Uses of Class
com.neatnodes.neatnodes.Genome

    • Uses of Genome in com.neatnodes.neatnodes

      Methods in com.neatnodes.neatnodes that return Genome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Genome Genome.cloneGenome()
      Returns a clone of this Genome with all the same nodes and connections represented by new objects.
      static Genome API.runSimulation(DataSet dataset, Configuration c, boolean visualize)
      Runs the complete NEAT algorithm to produce a Genome that implements the supplied DataSet as well as possible.
      Methods in com.neatnodes.neatnodes with parameters of type Genome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GenomeRenderer.addGenomeToCurrentGeneration(Genome g)
      For use in generational simulations.
      void GenomeRenderer.renderGenome(Genome g, java.lang.Double xPos, java.lang.Double yPos, java.lang.String styleSize)
      Takes a Genome and renders it on the graph with its bias node locked to the graph coordinates specified.
      static java.lang.Double[] API.runFunction(Genome g, java.lang.Double[] inputs, int depth)
      Runs the function implemented by the supplied Genome.
      static double API.testFitness(Genome g, DataSet d, int depth)
      Tests the fitness of a Genome for computing a function represented by the supplied DataSet.
      static void API.viewGenome(Genome g, Configuration c)
      Displays a single Genome in a window.
